name: RandomColourRole
short: Have a role that changes colour every 5 minutes.
description: May or may not be API intense but the cog is cool.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data whatsoever.
install_msg: Thank you for installing RandomColourRole. Load the cog with `[p]load randomcolourrole`. This cog can be API intense sometimes depending on how many guilds the bot is in.
author: NoobInDaHause
